translation.30-days-vacation: You are entitled to 30 days of vacation.
translation.divided-three-period: Vacation can be divided into up to three periods.
translation.one-period-14-days: One period must be of at least 14 days.
translation.two-periods-5-days-at-least: The other two periods must be of at least 5 days each.
translation.cannot-start-two-days-prior-holidays: The vacation period cannot start within two days prior to the holidays or weekly paid rests.
translation.must-return-to-work-one-day: You must return to work for at least 1 day before starting your vacation for a new vacation period.
translation.vacation-period-5-days: Vacation period needs to have at least 5 days.
translation.select-start-end-date: You need to select a start and end date
translation.cant-select-two-days-prior: A vacation period can not start within two days prior a holiday
